metadata.title: CVE-2020-6072 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the label-parsingfunctionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsing compressedlabels in mDNS messages, the rr_decode function's return value is notchecked, leading to a double free that could be exploited to executearbitrary code. An attacker can send an mDNS message to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: libmicrodns package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
